attributes.action: Parliamentary barista to be paid more than police officers
attributes.additional_details: It cannot be right that the UK Government values the services of a barista serving it coffee more than a new police recruit who could face danger everyday on our streets. This sends out the wrong message to the community and flies in the face of the Government's law and order policy. http://www.applythis.net/houseofcommons/Search/Vacancy/All/1/1149028/Barista%20Westminster%20England.html
